name: Explore the Old Orhei (Orheiul Vechi) Archaeological Complex
description: Discover the Old Orhei archaeological complex, showcasing a mix of historical and natural wonders, including ancient fortifications, monasteries, and caves.

name: Wine Tasting in Cricova Winery
description: Experience the vast underground wine cellars of Cricova Winery, famous for its extensive collection of wines and unique subterranean tasting tours.

name: Chisinau City Tour
description: Explore the capital city Chisinau, known for its Soviet-style architecture, green parks, and cultural landmarks.

name: Visit Soroca Fortress
description: Tour the Soroca Fortress, a historical fort that played a crucial role in Moldova's history, offering picturesque views of the Dniester River.

name: Capriana Monastery Pilgrimage
description: Visit the Capriana Monastery, one of the oldest monasteries in Moldova, known for its beautiful architecture and serene surroundings.

name: Tiraspol City Exploration
description: Discover Tiraspol, the capital of the breakaway region of Transnistria, showcasing a unique blend of Moldovan and Soviet influences.

name: Bender Fortress Visit
description: Explore the historical Bender Fortress, an important cultural and historical landmark located on the right bank of the Dniester River.

name: Tipova Monastery
description: Visit the scenic Tipova Monastery, one of the oldest monastic establishments in Moldova, situated in a picturesque cliff-side setting.

name: Gagauzia Cultural Tour
description: Experience the unique culture of Gagauzia, an autonomous region in Moldova, known for its distinct traditions, cuisine, and wine.

name: Milestii Mici Wine Cellars
description: Visit Milestii Mici, home to the largest wine cellar by collection in the world, offering an unforgettable wine tasting experience.
